title: Complex angle scaling
abstract: We introduce the method of complex angle scaling to study deformations of hyperbolic structure. We show how the method leads to a construction of counterexamples to the equivariant K=2 conjecture for hyperbolic convex hulls.
keywords: complex angle scaling, complex earthquakes, bending, convex hull, Sullivan’s theorem, K=2 conjecture
